main event: A witness saw a ball of fire moving from south to north at about 60 degrees elevation.
interesting points: The object was described as having a trail of white sparks following it., The witness reported the object made no sound., The estimated altitude of the object was 2- to 3 miles., The object was estimated to be the size of a full moon or 5 times its main body diameter., The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes.
sighted object: a ball of fire with trailing sparks
